name: Wenxuan Wang 0001
content: Wenxuan Wang HOME PUBLICATION TEAM ABOUT BACK TO TOP Wenxuan Wang 王文轩 Assistant Professor in Computer Science@Renmin University of China I am extremely outgoing. Please feel free to reach me at: Email: jwxwang@gmail.com | Google Scholar | Linkedin | | GitHub | Twitter ｜ | Research Lab: RUC-AIM3 | I am an assistant professor in the Computer Science Department at Renmin University of China (RUC). My research interest lies in the reliability and safety of Large Language Models. Before joining Renmin University of China, I was a PostDoc Fellow at Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST), working with Prof. Shuai Wang. I obtained my Ph.D. from the Chinese University of Hong Kong (CUHK) in 2024, advised by Prof. Michael R. Lyu. I obtained my B.Sc. from Huazhong University of Science and Technology (HUST). I was a research intern at Tencent AI Lab, working closely with Dr. Wenxiang Jiao and Dr. Zhaopeng Tu, and a visiting Ph.D. student at UCLA, working with Prof. Nanyun Violet Peng .
